Its cliche like that but it knows it and doesnt try to be something else. As far as a horror story\, it flowed seamlesly and didnt jump at irregular intervals as the story developed\, which can be the case for alot of horror type games/movies.Overall\, it was one of those games that kept me wanting to play.
